game.name: Devilated
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Devilated는 악마 같은 적을 학살하고 잡아먹는, 폭력적인 레트로 RPG 슈팅 게임입니다. 적들에게 먹히기 전에 먼저 먹어치우세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Devilated is an ultraviolent RPG old-school shooter where you brutalize and cannibalize your demonic foes in equal measure. Eat their face before they eat yours.

reviewHighlights.text: Duke Nukem, Doom, Ultrakill. You get the gist. Eat the corpses and like it.
